at.fhjoanneum.android.sqlite.fragment

Class CocktailListFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.fhjoanneum.android.sqlite.fragment.CocktailListFragment

  • public class CocktailListFragment
extends java.lang.Object
    This fragment shows a list of all cocktail from our database. Through GetCocktailTask class this Fragment gets its list items filled by the CocktailListAdaptor. This fragment has a search field where users can search for cocktail names, category and ingredients Users can sort the list by the name or by the rating.
    Author:
    Manuela Mayer, Rrahel Cemi

      Nested Classes

      class  CocktailListFragment.GetCocktailTask
      This class is responsible for getting the list of Cocktails out of the Database
